description.ko: 고도로 발달한 마천루와 비에 젖은 골목길이 어우러져 전형적인 사이버펑크 분위기를 자아내는, 끊임없는 네온 불빛으로 가득한 도시의 풍경입니다.
description.en: A sprawling urban landscape bathed in the glow of endless neon lights, where high-tech skyscrapers and rain-drenched alleys create a quintessential cyberpunk atmosphere.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a futuristic cyberpunk megacity at night, rain-slicked streets reflecting vibrant pink and cyan neon signs, flying vehicles zooming between towering skyscrapers, dense atmosphere with volumetric fog, high detail, 8k resolution, synthwave aesthetic, intricate mechanical details, hyper-realistic textures.
